original: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāvaṁ, sammāsambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tatra yvā ayam puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni abhisambujjhati tattha ca sabbaññu tam pāpuṇāti balesu ca vasībhāva sammāsambuddhaḥ tena daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhati, na ca tattha sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāvaṁ, paccekasambuddho tena daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tatra yvā ayam puggalaḥ pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni abhisambujjhati na ca tattha sabbaññu tam pāpuṇāti na ca balesu vasībhāva paccekasambuddhaḥ tena daṭṭhabbo

original: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
analyzed: tatra yvā ayam puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati

original: diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, sāvakapāramiñca pāpuṇāti, sāriputtamoggallānā tena daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: diṭṭhā iva dhamme dukkhassa anta karaḥ hoti sāvaka pāramiñca pāpuṇāti sāriputta moggallānā tena daṭṭhabbā

original: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
analyzed: tatra yvā ayam puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati

original: diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, na ca sāvakapāramiṁ pāpuṇāti, avasesā arahantā tena daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkhassa anta karaḥ hoti na ca sāvaka pāramim pāpuṇāti avasesāḥ arahantā tena daṭṭhabbā

original: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
analyzed: tatra yvā ayam puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati

original: na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṁ, anāgāmī tena daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: na ca diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkha ssanta karaḥ hoti anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthatta anāgāmī tena daṭṭhabbo

original: Tatra yvāyaṁ puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni anabhisambujjhati,
analyzed: tatra yvā ayam puggalaḥ pubbe an anussutesu dhammesu sāmam saccāni an abhisambujjhati

original: na ca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti, āgantā itthattaṁ, sotāpannasakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: na ca diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkha ssanta karaḥ hoti āgantāḥ itthatta sotāpanna sakadāgāmino tena daṭṭhabbā
